#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stack>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int base(int n)
{ //cout<<n<<endl;
     int sum;
    stack<int>s;
    while(n!=0)
    {
       int rem=n%7;
        n=n/7;
       // cout<<"rem "<<rem<<endl;
        //cout<<"n "<<n<<endl;
        s.push(rem);
    }
    sum=0;
    while(!s.empty())
    {
      int  rem=s.top();
     // cout<<"top "<<s.top()<<endl;
        s.pop();
        sum=10*sum+rem;
    }
    return sum;
}
int main()
{
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    while(n!=-1)
    {
        cout<<base(n)<<endl;
        cin>>n;
    }
    return 0;
}
